org.spongepowered.api.command.source

Interface CommandBlockSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommandSource, CompositeValueStore<DataHolder,DataManipulator<?,?>>, Contextual, DataHolder, DataSerializable, Locatable, MessageReceiver, PropertyHolder, Subject, ValueContainer<DataHolder>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommandBlock, CommandBlockMinecart

    public interface CommandBlockSource
extends Locatable, CommandSource, DataHolder
    Represents a CommandBlock source, either a placed block or a CommandBlockMinecart.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getCommandData

        default CommandData getCommandData()
        Gets the CommandData for this source.
        Returns:
        The command data

      • storedCommand

        default Value<String> storedCommand()
        Gets the currently stored command.
        Returns:
        The command

      • successCount

        default Value<Integer> successCount()
        Gets the success count of the last executed command.

        The success count is the number of times the most recently used command of this command block succeeded. Most commands can only succeed once per execution, but certain commands (such as those which accept players as arguments) can succeed multiple times, and this value will be set accordingly. This success count can also be polled via a redstone comparator.

        Returns:
        The last success count

      • doesTrackOutput

        default Value<Boolean> doesTrackOutput()
        Gets whether this command block will keep track of the output from the last command it executed.
        Returns:
        Whether the command output is tracked

      • lastOutput

        default OptionalValue<Text> lastOutput()
        Gets the last command output.

        This will only be available if doesTrackOutput() is set to true, otherwise Optional.empty() will be returned.

        Returns:
        The last command output, if available
